question: What is the effect of epiregulin on leptin secretion?

snippets.text: Epiregulin induces leptin secretion and energy expenditure in high-fat diet-fed mice.
EREG increased leptin production and secretion in a dose-dependent manner in iAb fat explants via the EGFR/MAPK pathway.
Our data revealed a new role of EREG in induction of leptin secretion leading to the energy expenditure state.
